question: Which of the following statements is the correct definition of Bio slurping?
option1: It refers to aerobic biological degradation of the hydrocarbons when air is introduced into the unsaturated zone
option2: It refers to use of indigenous microorganisms to biodegrade organic constituents in the saturated zone
option3: It is an in situ remediation technology that uses microorganisms for degradation of volatile organic compounds (VOCs)
option4: It is the process of using bacteria to dissolve metals instead of chemical solutions
answer: It refers to aerobic biological degradation of the hydrocarbons when air is introduced into the unsaturated zone
explanation: First option is the correct answer
